title: Remove Template Designer Option from UI

requirements.summary: Remove the Template Designer UI entry point from the application without modifying the TemplateDesigner component or any template code
acceptanceCriteria: No button, link, tab, or menu item that opens the Template Designer is visible in the UI.
The TemplateDesigner component file (TemplateDesigner.tsx) is not modified.
All existing fixed/built-in templates remain accessible and unchanged.
No template logic, template data, or backend code is altered.
The app builds and renders without errors after the change.

file_operations.description: Remove the 'Template Designer' button and its associated Dialog wrapper from the UI. Specifically: (1) Remove the Button component that has onClick={() => setShowTemplateDesigner(true)} and contains the text 'Template Designer' with the Pencil icon. (2) Remove the Dialog component that wraps the TemplateDesigner component and is controlled by the showTemplateDesigner state. (3) Optionally remove the showTemplateDesigner state variable and setShowTemplateDesigner setter if they are no longer used. Do not modify the TemplateDesigner component import or the component file itself. Ensure all remaining UI elements (loan form, download buttons, preview dialogs) continue to function normally.
